content: plus 4 more chains skip the number of single crochets that is the number divided by 4 then single_crochet that number of stitches chain the same number of stitches as you did the first time skip the same number of stitches then finish the round with single crochets example if you have 28 stitches around you would chain 1 then single_crochet in the next 4 stitches chain 11 skip 7 and crochet 14 chain 11 skip 14 then single_crochet until the row is complete slip_stitch to complete this row row 19 chain one then single_crochet around the entire top of the bag slip_stitch then work the end of you yarn into the project
